add_location_text.description: Button to add currently-searched city to list of saved locations

app_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store
app_description.message: Replace the new tab with breathtaking HD videos. Including weather and time.

app_name.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store

app_short_name.description: The short title of the application, displayed in the web store and from the app launcher

at_location_limit.description: Warning to indicate the user has added the maximum allowed amount of locations
at_location_limit.message: Youâ€™ve reached the 4 location limit. Remove a city before adding another one.

battery_mode.description: Alerts the user that they are seeing the battery mode

close_weather_preferences.description: Text for button to close weather preferences

configure_location_prompt.description: Prompt to configure the currently-previewing city before adding

existing_city_message.description: Displayed when a user attempts to add a city already in their list of cities.

link_about.description: Title of link to open the About dialogue

link_apps.description: Title of link to open the Apps page

link_bookmarks.description: Title of link to open the Bookmarks page

link_history.description: Title of link to open the History page

link_review.description: Title of link to review Delight

loading_videos.description: Alerts the user that videos are being loaded

location_not_found.description: Displayed when a searched location returned no results
location_not_found.message: Sorry, we couldn't find that location.

new_tab.description: Title of the New Tab page

no_connection.description: Alerts the user that they have no connection to the internet

open_weather_preferences.description: Text for button to open weather preferences

placeholder_search_cities.description: Placeholder text in the city weather search input

sponsor_title.description: Title of link to Pagecloud sponsor

toggle_credits.description: Visibility toggle for the video's credit information

toggle_launchers.description: Visibility toggle for Chrome launcher links

toggle_weather.description: Visibility toggle for the weather and time widget

weather_search_prompt.description: Prompt to search shown when no weather locations are saved
weather_search_prompt.message: View the weather and local time of a city by using the search field above.
